items.sentence: You can't just come in here and start ordering people around.
There are different amounts of medicine in these two bottles.
Learning should not be forced. Learning should be encouraged.
Tom's girlfriend is taller, stronger, and smarter than he is.
Tom and Mary bought their granddaughter a bike for Christmas.
Tom told us made-up stories to make himself seem interesting.
Tom sold the car that he'd stolen to an undercover policeman.
Tom lived in Boston for three years before moving to Chicago.
Tom was one of the first people I met when I moved to Boston.
This festival is one of the best festivals I've ever been to.
Several passengers on the train were injured in the accident.
You'd look ten years younger if you shaved off your mustache.
We're offering a reward for information leading to an arrest.
No matter how fast you may walk, you can't catch up with Tom.
This airplane is capable of carrying 40 passengers at a time.
Our captain got sick, so I attended the meeting in his place.
Shame on you for getting so flustered. You looked ridiculous.
I drank too much and the ground seemed to spin under my feet.
Please cover for me at the reception desk for about one hour.
Had he known the facts, the accident might have been avoided.
